categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Atom Edge was a freighter affiliated with the Rebel Alliance in use after the Battle of Yavin. It was carrying supplies to the Rebels on Tatooine when it was shot down. The Galactic Empire arrived at the crashsite first, and set up a trap for the Rebels. When Saponza's partner's forces arrived to salvage, the Imperials attacked, although they were defeated. The Rebels then recovered supplies.
Atom Edge appears in the 2014 Canon mobile game Star Wars: Commander, although only in the Rebel Alliance campaign.
